original_text: Fruit trees of all kinds will grow on both banks of the river. Their leaves will not wither, nor will their fruit fail. Every month they will bear fruit, because the water from the sanctuary flows to them. Their fruit will serve for food and their leaves for healing.”
korean_text: 강 좌우 가에는 각종 먹을 과실나무가 자라서 그 잎이 시들지 아니하며 열매가 끊이지 아니하고 달마다 새 열매를 맺으리니 그 물이 성소를 통하여 나옴이라 그 열매는 먹을 만하고 그 잎사귀는 약 재료가 되리라

sentences.original_text: Fruit trees of all kinds will grow
on both banks of the river.
Every month they will bear fruit
because the water from the sanctuary flows to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 성소에서 나온 물이 그들에게 흐르기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: Their fruit will serve for food
